content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to update the code in "calculate_distance.py" with a valid API key, but received an error message saying "Invalid API key provided." I then wrote the updated code with the valid API key to the file "calculate_distance.py" using the "write_to_file" command. I appended the code to the file using the "append_to_file" command with the filename "calculate_distance.py" and the text "# Define the API key\nAPI_KEY = 'YOUR_VALID_API_KEY'". The command returned a success message. I then received an error message while executing the "execute_python_file" command, indicating an invalid API key was provided. I received a message with a command to run "calculate_distance.py" but it returned an error message saying it was an unknown command. I also received an error message while executing the "execute_shell" command, indicating it was not allowed.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "calculate_distance.py", "text": "\\n# Define the API key\\nAPI_KEY = \'YOUR_VALID_API_KEY\'\\n"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: Error: Traceback (most recent call last):\n  File "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/calculate_distance.py", line 9, in <module>\n    gmaps = googlemaps.Client(key=API_KEY)\n  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.10/site-packages/googlemaps/client.py", line 144, in __init__\n    raise ValueError("Invalid API key provided.")\nValueError: Invalid API key provided.\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "nano calculate_distance.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: Error: This Shell Command is not allowed.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "calculate_distance.py", "text": "# Define the API key\\nAPI_KEY = \'YOUR_VALID_API_KEY\'\\n"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
